title: why my account has been suspended??????
body: i dont know why and i cant get it ;;;; are u guys working?? or just lounging around??? can u tell me why my account has been suspended and i cant accept this fact i didnt do anything for getting suspend.im angry and upset wow...fasdjfioiiapnsdakgnakfjlasf; tell me as soon as possible

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should have received an email about the reason for your suspension (Check your spam box!), if you're unable to locate this email or require further elaboration on your suspension reason then you'll have to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
